name: Flappy Burrd
description:
A quick first assignment in my third year Games Class. This part of the assignment is to make a flappy bird clone with some changes. I wanted to see how it would hold up on a web browser so I guess this is my first attempt at a WebGL build of a game. Hope it works, I already know this works for android.

Note, it takes a little while to load, I have to work on making it easier at that (or maybe it's just my browser...)

Controls:

Space or Left Mouse Click  -  Jumping

Esc Key or P  -  pause game (frozen game, no menu)

Special bits for this time around,

Song is "Knocked Out" from The Knock-Out Punch

and you have three lives.

My highest score on browser was 36!

Enjoy and keep watch of my itch and instagrams:

Instagram.com/jw.berry

Instagram.com/jwb_instagram

Follow~
